lines.text: It's really about control, my body, my mind. Who was going to own it? Them? Or me? I'm not a one-man woman. Bottom line.
Baby, you're so fine, I'd drink a tub of your bath water.

[begging Nola not to dump him]
Please baby, pleasebaby, please baby, baby baby please!
Nola's about as dependable as a ripped diaphragm.
If you weren't fine, I wouldn't even bother with you.
